suncertify.presentation
Class BookingMainFrame

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.presentation.BookingMainFrame

public class BookingMainFrame
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for launching the appropriate GUI depending on the application mode (ApplicationMode ENUM).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Black

Field Summary
private  ApplicationMode mode
          Holds the ApplicationMode.
 
Constructor Summary
BookingMainFrame(ApplicationMode mode)
          The constructor set the mode variable and calls the initialization method init().
 
Method Summary
private  void aloneInit()
          This method initializes the dialog window for configuring the stand alone application before the main GUI is launched.
private  void init()
          This method initializes the GUI and calls a further appropriate initialization method.
private  void networkClientInit()
          This method initializes the server GUI for configuring the network, starting and stopping the server.
private  void serverInit()
